reviewText: I was able to rip to my server with no problems. Movies are good quality, shipping took a while. I can't say they will play on a normal blu ray player on not.

Heroes?...Favorite! Actual research was done in Venice to apply the art-scape to this movie, and Davinci-mosque machinery and themes were fun additions! Just a fun movie across the board! The theme when Ash tries to catch Bianca is played over the accordion, and seems fun to dance to! "Search for the girl" is the song name.
Doesnt work with a US blu ray player either, don't buy!
